targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: You're the doc, Doc. All right. Come on. Let's go, Einie. Don't worry. She'll be fine. I don't remember bars bein' on these windows. If you need me, I'll be back at my lab dismantling this thing. Right. What

contextAfter.text: How long do you think she's gonna be out?
I'm not quite sure. She received quite a shock. Could be for a few minutes. Most probably, a couple of hours. You better bring smelling salts back with you.
